title: What are some good happy songs that make you feel good about yourself? - Quora

response.answer_text: I Am the best. 2. Kabhi kabhi Aditi.  3. Cry Cry.  4. Main koi esa geet gaoon.  5. Here I am.  6. Yuhin chala chal rahi.  7. Chand taare.  8. Oo sanam.  9. Na tum jano na hum.  10. Atrangi yaari. ( This one is for my friends, they stick with me through thick and thin ).  Ps :- my favorite is this one :P  Kya soorat hai, kya soorat h, kya soooorat hai..

Not for any particular reason, but just about all piano compositions I have ever listened to, and the scores that are usually played on National Public Radio. Anything from Tchaikovsky to Beethoven and Bach is usually a piece that I find makes me feel happier. With the academic answer out of the picture, there’s an array of songs that make me happy, and one in particular is “You Are My Sunshine”. It goes: You are my sunshine, My only sunshine. You make me happy, when skies are gray. You’ll never know dear, How much I love you, So please don’t take my sunshine away.  My mother would sing it to me as a child. This would be an awesome question for a certified music therapist, of which I am not. Hope this helps. :)
